nodes.text: The Servants were Sith Pureblood fanatics who served the Emperor of the Sith Empire originally as members of the Emperor's Hand. Later, after the Sith Emperor abandoned the Empire, the Servants continued to serve him contrary to the Empire's will.

Originally created as a title granted to the twelve members of the Emperor's Hand, the shadowy organization that served the Sith Emperor of the reconstituted Sith Empire. The position was a lifetime appointment, and the twelve Sith purebloods who made up the Hand were granted a link to their master's mind and a share of his immortality in exchange for the Emperor drawing upon their strength to sustain his own life. Around 3643 BBY, Servant One was chief among his fellow Servants, and he was constantly accompanied by Servant Two.
